api_endpoints.description: Allows you to create and manage custom and lookalike audiences, tailoring ads to specific user segments based on demographics, interests, and behaviors.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to return, e.g., impressions, clicks, spend.

parameters.name: time_range
parameters.description: The time range for the insights, formatted as JSON.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The access token for authentication.

api_endpoints.description: Provides valuable analytics about the performance of campaigns, ad sets, and ads, allowing you to track key metrics such as impressions, clicks, and conversions.

Output.name: messages
Output.description: An array of message objects containing the message ID and status.

parameters.name: recipient_type
parameters.description: Currently, you can only send messages to individuals. Set this as 'individual'. Default: 'individual'.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: WhatsApp ID or phone number of the customer you want to send a message to.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of message you want to send. If omitted, defaults to 'text'.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Required for text messages. A text object containing the message body.

parameters.name: audio
parameters.description: Required when type=audio. A media object containing audio.

parameters.name: document
parameters.description: Required when type=document. A media object containing a document.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: Required when type=image. A media object containing an image.

parameters.name: video
parameters.description: Required when type=video. A media object containing a video.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Required when type=location. A location object containing latitude and longitude.

parameters.name: interactive
parameters.description: Required when type=interactive. An interactive object containing the message components.

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: Required when type=template. A template object containing the message template details.

api_endpoints.description: Use the messages node to send text, media, contacts, locations, and interactive messages, as well as message templates to your customers.

Output.name: data
Output.description: An array containing the business profile data.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The fields you want to retrieve from the business profile.

api_endpoints.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve and update your business profile. Customers can view your business profile by clicking your business's name or number in a conversation thread.

Output.name: success
Output.description: Indicates whether the update was successful.

parameters.name: about
parameters.description: The business's About text. This text appears in the business's profile, beneath its profile image, phone number, and contact buttons.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Address of the business. Character limit 256.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the business. Character limit 512.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The contact email address of the business. Character limit 128.

parameters.name: messaging_product
parameters.description: The messaging service used for the request. Always set it to 'whatsapp'.

parameters.name: profile_picture_handle
parameters.description: Handle of the profile picture. This handle is generated when you upload the binary file for the profile picture to Meta.

parameters.name: vertical
parameters.description: Industry of the business. This can be either an empty string or one of the accepted values.

parameters.name: websites
parameters.description: The URLs associated with the business. For instance, a website, Facebook Page, or Instagram. You must include the http:// or https:// portion of the URL.

api_endpoints.description: To update your profile, make a POST call to this endpoint. You can include the parameters listed below.

Output.name: success
Output.description: Indicates whether the deletion was successful.

api_endpoints.description: To delete your business profile, you must delete your phone number.

Output.name: paging
Output.description: For more details about pagination, see the Graph API guide.

api_endpoints.description: Get information on purchases associated with this user-app pair
